snippet: The Islamist militant group, which has ties to Al Qaeda, claimed responsibility in a suicide bombing that killed at least 11 people at a training camp in Kismayo.
lead_paragraph: The Islamist militant group, which has ties to Al Qaeda, claimed responsibility in a suicide bombing that killed at least 11 people at a training camp in Kismayo.

headline.main: Shabab Bombing Kills at Least 11 at Somali Army Camp
